To Sandy, 

No problem, I had just posted that the same day you responded :)


To all, 

Anyone have an issue with me retaking the reigns on the Minions? This would leave Kraftlos as acting Fachead the Maximals, Airly Fachead the Predacons and the player for Megatron X, should he desire, fachead his brand of Decepticons?

Also, how far have the Maximals/Autobots penatrated into old Maximal base, and is this the same as the Ark, or the base from the toon? I am just making sure of everything before I jump in.

FYI fachead = Faction Head - the leader character of a particular faction (Ie: Optimus Prime, Megatron, Ect)

Preston
